reviews.text: Taste 8/8( bottle Aug20/07). Looks: Copper with thin tight-bubble head. Aroma: Odd..very grain/hay. Taste: Thin to medium bodied, yeasty brew with a lot of grain.
1/9 taste of a â07 bottle. Burnt toast flavor over a sweet barley wine/red ale mix. Malt and candy-sugar heavy. More cons than pros. Hope to never taste it again.
Choc. brown ale. Nice malt, lots of hops for what Iâm used to in a brown ale . About as much head as a beer can make. Ok.
